Title: Letters from Marusia
Writer: Miguel Littin, Patricio Manns (story), Freddy Taverna G. (adaptation)
Actors: Gian Maria Volontè, Diana Bracho, Claudio Obregón, Eduardo López Rojas
Plot: It is 1925 and working conditions in Chile are abysmal. The miners of Marusia go on strike, but the mine owners and the Government use the Chilean Army crush them.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 1 nomination.
